text: Shorncliffe can refer to: * Shorncliffe, Queensland, a suburb of Brisbane in Australia ** Shorncliffe railway line, to the suburb ** Shorncliffe railway station, Brisbane, in the suburb * Shorncliffe, Kent, a district of Folkestone, Kent, England, home to an army camp ** Shorncliffe Army Camp, a military establishment ** Shorncliffe Redoubt, a British Napoleonic earthwork fort in Kent
title: Shorncliffe
